trivia_items.text: Blemishine is one of the few characters in Arknights whose years of fighting experience is not labeled as "Combat Experience" in their Archive files. In her case, it is labeled as "Competition Knight Experience" instead.
Blemishine's facial expressions in the base have become templates of some fan arts.

Shamare in her Echo of the Horrorlair outfit, Snowsant in her Fated Hero outfit and Phantom's cat miss Christine are present around Blemishine in her Moon Catastrborn. There are also two unknown Kurantas wearing pumpkin helmets (probably Nearl and Whislash).
